channel.title: CVE Feed for tuned -- tuned
channel.description: The latest CVEs for tuned -- tuned

item.title: CVE-2013-1820|2024-08-06T15:13:33.024Z -- tuned -- tuned
item.description: tuned before 2.x allows local users to kill running processes due to insecure permissions with tuned's ktune service.

item.title: CVE-2012-6136|2024-08-06T21:28:38.963Z -- tuned -- tuned
item.description: tuned 2.10.0 creates its PID file with insecure permissions which allows local users to kill arbitrary processes.
